Entries.default:
A rickety metal cage swings over an abyss. Your clothes billow with a foul wind from below, and faint screams and roars echo from the depths.

Still, you can make out no details from this distance.

You step into the jouncing cage. The door slams shut, and your descent begins with the rattle of chains.

As your eyes adjust to the gloom, you begin to make out crumbling ruins and shadows flickering between them.

The cage comes to rest with a groan.
You see a rusting metal cage. The long chain attached to it disappears in a gray fog above you.

The cage shudders as the chain above pulls taut. 

You begin your slow, swinging ascent.
